tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Jennifer knows her subject matter (screenwriting) very well since she is a veteran of the industry. She will show you how to be a better screenwriting as well as the ins-and-outs of selling your screenplay to Hollywood. She is professional, knowledgeable, patient, and goes the extra mile to help you write a better script.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Ms. van Sijll provided an interesting international perspective to a class on international films. She\'d spent years in China and had much to offer the class. Class was essay intensive--she was honest about it up front & was very prompt with grading. She showed a genuine interest in her students, going above and beyond to help bring out potential.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: warning to future film analysis students! This teacher has the biggest ego ever! Don\'t know why she is still at MC???? I believe she teaches this class just to get her students to buy her book that is useless to the class. She is very unclear, unorganized, and quick to shoot down any opinions she doesn\'t feel fit hers! Good luck!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She has said some nice things about my style of writing. When she says something nice, she makes you feel really good about it. I think she knows that she is disorganized & makes it up by going easy on a few things.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Wow! She really upset alot of students this week! Well my comment doesnt get any better!She is a condescending, patronizing, egotistical, teacher. She thinks she too good for MC. She should do MC students and herself a favor and not teach at this school!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Terrible, mean, and heartless person I have ever taken. Never take her class. She is a biased teacher of Politics. She should teach at Stanford or some other University, Not College!!! She maks me dislike watching movies.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This teacher has the BIGGEST EGO I have ever seen on any teacher at MC!! She is extremly critical, rude and ruthless! She picks apart her students and shoots them down when you antempt to give your point of view. She goes on and on about her book and her background. She does not belong at MC! Its a true shame!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I truly enjoyed her class! I loved the openness in which we could debate & yet we still remained respectful of everyone\'s views. I like the she pushes us to think outside our comfort zone. Her class was a pleasure to be in & I would highly recommend it to future students. She is very nice & always willing to help too :-)

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She\'s teaching the wrong class. She\'d be a perfect screenwriting teacher, but she doesn\'t show us much about politics, probably because she\'s trying to sell her book. She says "there\'s no wrong answer" and when you turn in your work everything is wrong! She\'s ruthless about grading,you probably won\'t do well if you\'re not a natural born critic
